name: Pop The Dots Bubble Puzzle FREE: Chain Reaction Game - By Dead Cool Apps

description:
*** WARNING - DO NOT Download! Considered INSANELY Addictive ***

Pop The Dots Bubble Puzzle is easy to play but hard to master! Simple objective - Pop all the dots to clear the screen with a limited number of taps.

With over 500 brain puzzling levels - Pop The Dots is extremely addictive.

FEATURES INCLUDE:

• Powerups to help you on hard levels
• FREE daily hints
• Ask friends on FaceBook or Twitter for help on levels

Will you be the one to clear all levels? Download NOW 100% FREE.
